ARABIC: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّهُمْ فِى كُلِّ وَادٍ يَهِيمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do you not see how they ramble on in every style
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Have you not seen that they wander distract in every valley,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do you not see that they wander about in every valley
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have you not seen them wandering and bewildered in every valley
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Did you not see that they keep wandering in every valley?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: See you not that they speak about every subject in their poetry
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Do you not see that they wander about bewildered in every valley?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: hast thou not seen how they wander in every valley
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Hast thou not seen how they stray in every valley,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do you not see how they wander aimlessly in every valley,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Observest thou not, that they Wander about every vale.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Have you not regarded that they rove in every valley,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Seest thou not that they wander distracted in every valley?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: See you not that they speak about every subject (praising others right or wrong) in their poetry?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Have you not seen how they wander in every valley,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do you not see how they ramble in every style?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Do you not see that in every valley they roam
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:225] Have you not noticed that — are you not aware that — in every valley, of the valleys of rhetoric and the art thereof, they rove, overstepping the bounds [of decency] in [their] eulogies and diatribes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Hast thou not seen how they) the poets (stray) they come and go, sometimes eulogizing and sometimes satirizing (in every valley) in every genre and theme,
